scripts.deploy:no: cp public/index-no.html public/index.html && npm run build && echo 'cryptek.no' > build/CNAME && gh-pages -d build -r git@github.com:sogasg/cryptek-deploy-no.git -b master
scripts.deploy:se: cp public/index-se.html public/index.html && npm run build && echo 'cryptek.se' > build/CNAME && gh-pages -d build -r git@github.com:sogasg/cryptek-deploy-se.git -b master
scripts.deploy:dk: cp public/index-dk.html public/index.html && npm run build && echo 'cryptek.dk' > build/CNAME && gh-pages -d build -r git@github.com:sogasg/cryptek-deploy-dk.git -b master
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-no && npm run deploy-se && npm run deploy-dk
